verses.verse: Now Yiftach <WH3316> the Gil`adi <WH1569> was a mighty man <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>, and he was the son <WH1121> of an harlot <WH802> <WH2181> <WH8802>: and Gil`ad <WH1568> begat <WH3205> <WH8686> Yiftach <WH3316>.

And Gil`ad's <WH1568> wife <WH802> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him sons <WH1121>; and his wife's <WH802> sons <WH1121> grew up <WH1431> <WH8799>, and they thrust out <WH1644> <WH8762> Yiftach <WH3316>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thou shalt not inherit <WH5157> <WH8799> in our father's <WH1> house <WH1004>; for thou art the son <WH1121> of a strange <WH312> woman <WH802>.

Then Yiftach <WH3316> fled <WH1272> <WH8799> from <WH6440> his brethren <WH251>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Tob <WH2897>: and there were gathered <WH3950> <WH8691> vain <WH7386> men <WH582> to Yiftach <WH3316>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799> with him.
And it came to pass in process of time <WH3117>, that the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> made war <WH3898> <WH8735> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And it was so, that when the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> made war <WH3898> <WH8738> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, the elders <WH2205> of Gil`ad <WH1568> went <WH3212> <WH8799> to fetch <WH3947> <WH8800> Yiftach <WH3316> out of the land <WH776> of Tob <WH2897>:
And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yiftach <WH3316>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and be our captain <WH7101>, that we may fight <WH3898> <WH8735> with the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the elders <WH2205> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, Did not ye hate <WH8130> <WH8804> me, and expel <WH1644> <WH8762> me out of my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>? and why are ye come <WH935> <WH8804> unto me now when ye are in distress <WH6887> <WH8804> ?

And the elders <WH2205> of Gil`ad <WH1568> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yiftach <WH3316>, Therefore we turn again <WH7725> <WH8804> to thee now, that thou mayest go <WH1980> <WH8804> with us, and fight <WH3898> <WH8738> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and be our head <WH7218> over all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the elders <WH2205> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, If ye bring me home again <WH7725> <WH8688> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and the YY <WH3068> deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> them before <WH6440> me, shall I be your head <WH7218> ?

And the elders <WH2205> of Gil`ad <WH1568> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yiftach <WH3316>, The YY <WH3068> be witness <WH8085> <WH8802> between us, if we do <WH6213> <WH8799> not so according to thy words <WH1697>.

Then Yiftach <WH3316> went <WH3212> <WH8799> with the elders <WH2205> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, and the people <WH5971> made <WH7760> <WH8799> him head <WH7218> and captain <WH7101> over them: and Yiftach <WH3316> uttered <WH1696> <WH8762> all his words <WH1697> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> in Mizpeh <WH4709>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> unto the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What hast thou to do with me, that thou art come <WH935> <WH8804> against me to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> in my land <WH776> ?

And the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> answered <WH559> <WH8799> unto the messengers <WH4397> of Yiftach <WH3316>, Because Yisra'EL <WH3478> took away <WH3947> <WH8804> my land <WH776>, when they came up <WH5927> <WH8800> out of Egypt <WH4714>, from Arnon <WH769> even unto Yabok <WH2999>, and unto Yarden <WH3383>: now therefore restore those lands again <WH7725> <WH8685> peaceably <WH7965>.
And Yiftach <WH3316> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> again <WH3254> <WH8686> unto the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>:

And said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> Yiftach <WH3316>, Yisra'EL <WH3478> took not away <WH3947> <WH8804> the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, nor the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>:

But when Yisra'EL <WH3478> came up <WH5927> <WH8800> from Egypt <WH4714>, and walked <WH3212> <WH8799> through the wilderness <WH4057> unto the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Kadesh <WH6946>;

Then Yisra'EL <WH3478> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> unto the king <WH4428> of Edom <WH123>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Let me, I pray thee, pass through <WH5674> <WH8799> thy land <WH776>: but the king <WH4428> of Edom <WH123> would not hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> thereto. And in like manner they sent <WH7971> <WH8804> unto the king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124>: but he would <WH14> <WH8804> not consent: and Yisra'EL <WH3478> abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in Kadesh <WH6946>.

Then they went along <WH3212> <WH8799> through the wilderness <WH4057>, and compassed <WH5437> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>, and the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> by the east side <WH4217> <WH8121> of the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> on the other side <WH5676> of Arnon <WH769>, but came <WH935> <WH8804> not within the border <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>: for Arnon <WH769> was the border <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> unto Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, the king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>; and Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Let us pass <WH5674> <WH8799>, we pray thee, through thy land <WH776> into <WH5704> my place <WH4725>.

But Sichon <WH5511> trusted <WH539> <WH8689> not Yisra'EL <WH3478> to pass <WH5674> <WH8800> through his coast <WH1366>: but Sichon <WH5511> gathered <WH622> all his people <WH5971> together <WH622> <WH8799>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> in YAHaz <WH3096>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> Sichon <WH5511> and all his people <WH5971> into the hand <WH3027> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them: so Yisra'EL <WH3478> possessed <WH3423> <WH8799> all the land <WH776> of the Amorites <WH567>, the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of that country <WH776>.
And they possessed <WH3423> <WH8799> all the coasts <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567>, from Arnon <WH769> even unto Yabok <WH2999>, and from the wilderness <WH4057> even unto Yarden <WH3383>.

So now the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> hath dispossessed <WH3423> <WH8689> the Amorites <WH567> from before <WH6440> his people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and shouldest thou possess <WH3423> <WH8799> it?

Wilt not thou possess <WH3423> <WH8799> that which K'mosh <WH3645> thy god <WH430> giveth thee to possess <WH3423> <WH8686>? So whomsoever the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> shall drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> from before <WH6440> us, them will we possess <WH3423> <WH8799>.

And now art thou any thing better <WH2896> than Balak <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor <WH6834>, king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124>? did he ever <WH7378> <WH8800> strive <WH7378> <WH8804> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, or did he ever <WH3898> <WH8736> fight <WH3898> <WH8738> against them,

While Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8800> in Heshbon <WH2809> and her towns <WH1323>, and in Aroer <WH6177> and her towns <WH1323>, and in all the cities <WH5892> that be along by the coasts <WH3027> of Arnon <WH769>, three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141>? why therefore did ye not recover <WH5337> <WH8689> them within that time <WH6256> ?

Wherefore I have not sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against thee, but thou doest <WH6213> <WH8802> <WH853> me wrong <WH7451> to war <WH3898> <WH8736> against me: the YY <WH3068> the Judge <WH8199> <WH8802> be judge <WH8199> <WH8799> this day <WH3117> between the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>.
Howbeit the king <WH4428> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto the words <WH1697> of Yiftach <WH3316> which he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> him.

Then the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> came upon Yiftach <WH3316>, and he passed over <WH5674> <WH8799> Gil`ad <WH1568>, and M'nasheh <WH4519>, and passed over <WH5674> <WH8799> Mizpeh <WH4708> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, and from Mizpeh <WH4708> of Gil`ad <WH1568> he passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> unto the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> vowed <WH5087> <WH8799> a vow <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, If thou shalt without fail <WH5414> <WH8800> deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> into mine hands <WH3027>,

Then it shall be, that whatsoever <WH3318> <WH8802> cometh forth <WH3318> <WH8799> of the doors <WH1817> of my house <WH1004> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> me, when I return <WH7725> <WH8800> in peace <WH7965> from the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, shall surely be the YY'S <WH3068>, and I will offer it up <WH5927> <WH8689> for a burnt offering <WH5930>.

So Yiftach <WH3316> passed over <WH5674> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against them; and the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into his hands <WH3027>.

And he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them from Aroer <WH6177>, even till thou come <WH935> <WH8800> to Minnith <WH4511>, even twenty <WH6242> cities <WH5892>, and unto the plain <WH58> of the vineyards <WH3754> <WH8677> <WH64>, with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>. Thus the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> were subdued <WH3665> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Yiftach <WH3316> came <WH935> <WH8799> to Mizpeh <WH4709> unto his house <WH1004>, and, behold, his daughter <WH1323> came out <WH3318> <WH8802> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> him with timbrels <WH8596> and with dances <WH4246>: and she was his only child <WH3173>; beside her he had neither son <WH1121> nor <WH176> daughter <WH1323>.

And it came to pass, when he saw <WH7200> <WH8800> her, that he rent <WH7167> <WH8799> his clothes <WH899>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Alas <WH162>, my daughter <WH1323> ! thou hast brought <WH3766> me very <WH3766> <WH8689> low <WH3766> <WH8687>, and thou art one of them that trouble <WH5916> <WH8802> me: for I have opened <WH6475> <WH8804> my mouth <WH6310> unto the YY <WH3068>, and I cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> go back <WH7725> <WH8800>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, My father <WH1>, if thou hast opened <WH6475> <WH8804> thy mouth <WH6310> unto the YY <WH3068>, do <WH6213> <WH8798> to me according to that which <WH834> hath proceeded <WH3318> <WH8804> out of thy mouth <WH6310>; forasmuch <WH310> as the YY <WH3068> hath taken <WH6213> <WH8804> vengeance <WH5360> for thee of thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, even of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her father <WH1>, Let this thing <WH1697> be done <WH6213> <WH8735> for me: let me alone <WH7503> <WH8685> two <WH8147> months <WH2320>, that I may go up <WH3212> <WH8799> and down <WH3381> <WH8804> upon the mountains <WH2022>, and bewail <WH1058> <WH8799> my virginity <WH1331>, I and my fellows <WH7464> <WH8675> <WH7474>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>. And he sent her away <WH7971> <WH8799> for two <WH8147> months <WH2320>: and she went <WH3212> <WH8799> with her companions <WH7464>, and bewailed <WH1058> <WH8799> her virginity <WH1331> upon the mountains <WH2022>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7093> of two <WH8147> months <WH2320>, that she returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto her father <WH1>, who did <WH6213> <WH8799> with her according to his vow <WH5088> which he had vowed <WH5087> <WH8804>: and she knew <WH3045> <WH8804> no man <WH376>. And it was a custom <WH2706> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>,

That the daughters <WH1323> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went <WH3212> <WH8799> yearly <WH3117> <WH3117> to lament <WH8567> <WH8763> the daughter <WH1323> of Yiftach <WH3316> the Gil`adi <WH1569> four <WH702> days <WH3117> in a year <WH8141>.
